markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 369 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Andoletta](/Deities.aspx?ID=112), [Arundhat](/Deities.aspx?ID=186), [Arundhat](/Deities.aspx?ID=186), [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2) or [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) you hold
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a _+1 striking weapon_ while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.
name: Shillelagh

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />

</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 369 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
</summary>
summary: Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
summary_markdown: Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
text: Shillelagh Source Core Rulebook pg. 369 4.0 Tradition Primal Deities Andoletta, Arundhat, Arundhat, Elven Pantheon Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 club or staff you hold Duration 1 minute --- The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.
